short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shares reading passages using the Fluency Tutor for Google app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* This extension should be installed alongside the Fluency Tutor App: http://www.fluencytutorforgoogle.com *

Share with Fluency Tutor allows teachers to share content from any website to their students to read using the Fluency Tutor application.

Students can install the extension so they can choose which content they want to read and read independently of the teacher.
